FILEBROWSER.title: Filebrowser

MKDOCS_LIVE.title: MkDocs live server
MKDOCS_LIVE.description: Serve your MkDocs project with live reload. For example, cd /home/examples/mkdocs-material; mkdocs serve -a 0.0.0.0:8040
